english.segment1: Outside the thunder crashes. And the storms are gaining fast. Though it's raining in my heart. I know that you are
english.segment2: The sunshine above the weather. Always and forever. Your love will remain. My rock and mighty fortress. I'm walking in your promise. Your love will remain
english.segment3: When everything is broken. And the darkness closes in. You are never far from me. Deep inside I see
english.segment4: bridge: I fade out. I run away. But through it all you stay. The sunshine - it's breaking through when I need you. Your love will remain
